creator: stoehr_sukachevin@hotmail.com
text:
In the "catalina.bat" file [v 1.18 2001/09/12 17:38:47], there is a 
missing "lib" subdirectory such that "%JSSE_HOME%\jsse.jar" should be "%
JSSE_HOME%\lib\jsse.jar".  This prevents configuring Tomcat with SSL via the 
JSSE_HOME env variable way.

Note that the "lib" subdirectory is correctly present in "catalina.sh" [v 1.20 
2001/09/14 20:01:21] (i.e., "$JSSE_HOME/lib/jsse.jar").
